QuestData.Title: Leyline Abuse
QuestData.Description: These monsters are pulling mana directly out of the ground. This explains why not even my mana pools can dull my pain.$b$bI worry about my brood. Without the power of the ley lines, we are nothing. At this rate, I may not even be able to help you with your Tidestone.$b$bLook for their mana siphons, and punish the cowardly nightfallen elves that are using them.
QuestData.CompletionText: With each one of these cretins you slay, I grow stronger.
QuestData.RewardText: I do feel a bit stronger.$b$bThose siphons nearly did me in, $n.
